title: 2.2 Pay Day
description:
Psychiatric assessment, the coffee jar, something going down.

Visit passengerlist.org to see a script and full list of credits for “Pay Day” and join the investigation.

Passenger List Season 2 was created and directed by John Scott Dryden; sound designed by Steve Bond; with music by Mark Henry Phillips. “Pay Day” was written by Sara Lotz. Passenger List is a proud member of Radiotopia, from PRX.

KAITLIN – Kelly Marie Tran
RORY - Ben Daniels
DR MORLEY – Jennifer Armour
JIM – Rob Benedict
PSYCHIC WITCH – Patti LuPone
PETRA - Laurel Lefkow
HASSAN - Raad Rawi
MRS DENNISON - Barbara Barnes

OTHER VOICES:
Christopher Ragland, Eric Meyers, Munirih Grace, David Menkin, Danielle Lewis, Eric Sirakian, Clare Corbett, Chris Kelly, Merk Nguyen.
